name: Cybereason
description: This app integrates with the Cybereason platform to perform investigative, contain and corrective actions on Malop and Malware events

base_url.description: The URL of the Cybereason server to connect to. This should be of the form 'https://<server name or ip>:<port>'

verify_server_cert.description: If checked, will verify the SSL certificate of the Cybereason server.

username.description: A valid username for connecting to the Cybereason server

password.description: A valid password for connecting to the Cybereason server

malop_historical_days.description: The number of days for which we want to get Malops (This parameter will be used for the first-time poll only, and will be ignored in subsequent polls)

malware_historical_days.description: The number of days for which we want to get Malware (This parameter will be used for the first-time poll only, and will be ignored in subsequent polls)

override_malop_severity_map.description: A JSON string that the user can add to override the default severity mapping for different malop types.

malware_severity.description: The severity to apply for all malware events

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
actions.verbose: Test the connectivity with the Cybereason server configured by the user.

actions.description: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality

container_count.description: Maximum number of containers to ingest

actions.description: Deletes the specified registry key for a given malop id and machine name
actions.verbose: A malop can contain processes which write to Windows registry keys. This action will fire a remediation action on the Cybereason console that will delete the registry key using the Cybereason sensor installed on the machine.

malop_id.description: The ID of the malop for deleting the registry key

machine_name.description: The name of the machine on which we want to delete the registry key

actions.description: Get the connectivity status for all machine sensors in a Malop
actions.verbose: Each machine covered by Cybereason will have a sensor installed on it. This action will extract the sensor status for all machines in a Malop.

malop_id.description: The malop ID for which we will get sensor status information

actions.description: Add a comment to the provided Malop ID

malop_id.description: The malop ID for which we want to add comment

comment.description: The comment that we want to add to the malop

actions.description: Update status for the provided Malop ID such as Under Investigation, To review etc

malop_id.description: The malop ID for which we want to update status

status.description: Status that will be assigned to the malop

actions.description: Blocks all communication to and from the machine. Communication with the Cybereason platform is not affected

malop_id.description: The malop ID for which we want to isolate the machine

actions.description: Unblocks all communication to and from the machine

malop_id.description: The malop ID for which we want to unisolate the machine

actions.description: Kills the active process on the machine

malop_id.description: The malop ID for which we want to kill process

remediation_user.description: The user id who is killing the process

machine_id.description: Machine name associated with that malop ID

process_id.description: Cybereason Process ID of the process to kill

actions.description: Gets the remediation status for a previously executed remediation action like Kill Process

malop_id.description: The malop ID for which we want to kill process

remediation_user.description: The user id that has requested the remediation action

remediation_id.description: An ID that specifies a previously executed remediation action like Kill Process

actions.description: Blacklists / Whitelists a file hash so that future malop detections can quickly identify the hash

reputation_item_hash.description: The item (hash, IP) for which we want to set the reputation

custom_reputation.description: The custom reputation that we want to set for the reputation item.

actions.description: Queries a given malop to retrieve all processes

malop_id.description: The ID of the malop for which we want to get process details

actions.description: Queries a given machine name to retrieve all that machine's information
Queries a given user to retrieve all user related details
Queries a given filename to retrieve all file details
Queries a given domain name to retrieve all details of that domain
Queries a given name to retrieve all details of that connection
